pullRequest.title: Eliminate wildcard imports in QS and added script for check QS
pullRequest.bodyText:
Eliminate wildcard imports in QS and added script for check QS to ensure no new appear in the codebase.
Check list:
Your pull request:

 targets the development branch
 uses the 999-SNAPSHOT version of Quarkus
 has tests (mvn clean test)
 works in native (mvn clean package -Pnative)
 has native tests (mvn clean verify -Pnative)
 makes sure the documentation must not be updated
 links the documentation update pull request (if needed)
quarkusio/quarkus#7068
 updates or creates the README.md file (with build and run instructions)
 For new quickstart, is located in the directory component-quickstart
 For new quickstart, is added to the root pom.xml and README.md

nodes.bodyText: This is not a helpful error message. Please don't use star imports in your Java files: would be better.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -19,6 +19,13 @@ jobs:
           key: ${{ runner.os }}-maven-${{ hashFiles('**/pom.xml') }}
           restore-keys: |
             ${{ runner.os }}-maven-
+      - name: Check Wildcards
+        run: |
+          if [ $(git grep import | grep '\*;' | grep -E -v '(.mvn/|README.md|CONTRIBUTING.md)' | wc -l) != 0 ]; then
+            echo "Wildcard found!"

commit.message: Eliminate wildcard imports in QS and added script for check QS to ensure no new appear in the codebase.
